1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 '''Allow to calculate minimal audio volume (rms) value'''
3 
4 import pyaudio
5 import audioop
6 import time
7 import rospy
8 
9 import logging
10 
11 logging.basicConfig(filename='rms.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
12  level=logging.ERROR)
13 
14 from typing import Dict
15 
16 class RMS:
17  '''Calculates minimal audio volume (rms) value'''
18 
19  def __init__(self, rms_intervals_number=None, rms_interval_length=None, time_interval=None):
20  '''Init method
21  Args:
22  rms_intervals_number: number of rms intervals
23  rms_interval_length: length of rms interval
24  time_interval: interval of time to calculate minimal rms
25  '''
26  self.error = False
27  try:
28  self.audio = pyaudio.PyAudio()
29  self.chunk = 1024
30  self.rate = 16000
31  self.channels = 1
32 
33  self.stream = self.audio.open(format=pyaudio.paInt16, channels=self.channels, rate=self.rate, input=True, frames_per_buffer=self.chunk)
34  self.stream.start_stream()
35 
36  if rms_intervals_number is None:
37  rms_intervals_number = 200
38  self.rms_intervals_number = rms_intervals_number
39  if rms_interval_length is None:
40  rms_interval_length = 500
41  self.rms_interval_length = rms_interval_length
42  self.intervals_bounds = [i * self.rms_interval_length for i in range(0, rms_intervals_number)]
43 
44  if time_interval is None:
45  time_interval = 1
46 
47  self.time_interval = time_interval
48  except Exception as e:
49  logging.error(str(e))
50  self.error = True
51 
52  def __max_key__(self, dictionary):
53  '''Finds key for dictionary max value
54  Args:
55  dictionary: dictionary for search
56  Returns:
57  key: dictionary key
58  '''
59 
60  max_value = max(dictionary.values())
61  keys = dictionary.keys()
62  for key in keys:
63  if dictionary[key] == max_value:
64  return key
65 
66 
67  def set_rms_intervals_numbers(self, rms_intervals_number):
68  '''Sets number of intervals
69  Args:
70  rms_intervals_number: number of intervals
71  '''
72 
73  self.intervals_bounds = [i * self.rms_interval_length for i in range(0, rms_intervals_number)]
74 
75  def set_time_interval(self, time_interval):
76  '''Sets time interval during which calculate minimal rms
77  Args:
78  time_interval: time interval
79  '''
80 
81  self.time_interval = time_interval
82 
83  def get_min_rms(self):
84  '''Calculates and return minimal rms value
85  Returns:
86  minimal rms value
87  '''
88  if not self.error is True:
89  intervals_rating = dict.fromkeys([i for i in range(0, self.rms_intervals_number)], 0)
90  start = time.time()
91  rms = []
92 
93  while time.time() - start < self.time_interval:
94 
95  chunk = self.stream.read(self.chunk)
96  cur_rms = audioop.rms(chunk, 2)
97  rms.append(cur_rms)
98  rate_index = audioop.rms(chunk, 2) // self.rms_interval_length
99  intervals_rating[rate_index] += 1
100 
101  most_popular_rms_interval = self.__max_key__(intervals_rating)
102  return (most_popular_rms_interval + 1) * self.rms_interval_length
103  else:
104  return 0
105 
106 
107 rms = RMS()
108 #broadcasting minimal rms value
109 while True:
110  rospy.set_param('min_rms',rms.get_min_rms())
